long_description: The dual-purpose Crazy Creek Air Chair Plus converts easily from a chair to a full-length sleeping pad to keep you comfortable on camping excursions. Pad inflates to 2.5 in. thick for cushioning on the hard ground. When you want to lie down, all you need to do is inflate the leg extension that is stowed inside the seat cover and unclip the buckles at the sides. Outer seat cover is made from 210-denier coated ripstop nylon to withstand abrasion. Crazy Creek Air Chair Plus rolls up compactly for easy carrying when you're on the go.
